comments.text:
Look loveanimalsandcookin, I'm really not. I'm internally grateful for All 
the gifts that I got and I know that not everyone can get presents on 
Christmas and I am thankful that I can. I'm not spoiled actually I got 
things that are very useful and not just blow off gifts. I know it might 
have came off like I was spoiled but I promise I'm not, I work hard all 
year for my gifts I don't buy a lot of stuff 2 months before so that my 
parents can see what I really want with out spending it all before 
Christmas. I'm sorry that you think I'm spoiled but I'm very not. I hope 
you have a great day. Goodbye:)

top_comment.text:
Hey I really want to start a YouTube channel but I really don't have any 
ideas for videos. And I don't have any subscribers. So if any one can reply 
and give me some ideas for my first video that would be great.😊 ----And 
maybe even subscribe😉﻿
top_comment.author: Sophia Pompilli

comments.text:
I would start off with a 25 facts about me, or maybe some sort of 
challenge? like the blindfolded makeup challenge, or the wrong-handed 
makeup challenge? 
You could also just do a simple makeup look. And i guess just wait for 
people to discover you! If that's taking too long you could always promote 
your channel on other people's videos. (ex: Hey my name is Sophia and I 
just started a beauty channel! If you could check out my videos that would 
be awesome! thanks!)
Although be careful where you promote, because it can annoy some people if 
you do it too much. Hope I helped!
comments.author: Zahra Chaudhary

comments.text:
Ya I really wanted to do a Beauty chunky and do DIY's and Q&A but I don't 
know how to start of my channel 😁
comments.author: Sophia Pompilli

comments.text:
Maybe you could start a beauty channel? Maybe do some makeup looks, morning 
routines, night routines, or DIYs???
Or you could start a comedy channel and make videos about funny things that 
happen in your everyday life ;) 
Or just do a random channel with a bunch of different videos! 
Whichever you decide, I hope you're successful and I wish you good luck! :)
comments.author: Zahra Chaudhary

captions.text:
It's Brooklyn and
Bailey, and today, we

are going to show you guys
what we got for Christmas,

but first, we would like
to say we hope you all

had a very merry Christmas
and we are super excited.

We discovered something
on Christmas day.

We are so close to one
million subscribers.

We just really, really
want to hit a million.

-We really, really want
to accomplish this goal.

-We really want
to hit a million.

So let's get started with
the stuff that we have.

Well, you guys probably
all know if you've

watched previous videos that
we actually love candles.
It's called Picnic in the Park.

-It looks really nice because
now it's winter and it's gray,

and so this is nice and
pretty and green for summer.

This was my biggest Christmas
present was my guitar.

And I also got a special
little helper here.

And you put it on
your guitar, and then

if you press this button--
like I'll press this one--

and you can play
a G. Or this one,

you can play G. It plays
the chords for you.

And then I've learned the
chords without this helper.

So it makes me sound like
I know what I'm doing.

And then I got this special
present from Santa Claus.
It is my own MacBook Pro.

We've been sharing
one for a long time,

but as you all probably
know, in school,

you do a lot of
assignments on a computer,

and there's two
of us sharing one.

-It gets really hard
to share a computer.

-It gets really hard to
share, so I got my own,

-Which means I have my
own, which is OK with me.

-And I got this adorable
purple case, so I'm excited.

So I just ran out
of my perfume, so I

was able to get
a new little box.

-As you all know, that's
what her favorite smell is.

-And then mine is Twisted
Peppermint from Bath and Body

Works, and I got lotion
and shower stuff.

-She's going to smell
like winter all year.

-This is the best
thing in the world.

So next up, we have these
wallets from mom and dad.

I was like, what is that?

And then I pulled it out and
I was like, oh, it's so cute.

They're just as
long, aren't they?

We could be like
a face, kind of.

-I really, really needed a
wallet, so this was helpful,

-We each got a box
of Life cereal.

For those of you who
don't know what this is,
it's my favorite cereal of life.

-It's literally Life, and
then it's actually life.

-And we never buy it because we
always eat it all in one day.

-And so for Christmas,
all the kids

got their own big
box of Life cereal.

-And we all got two and a

-Reese's peanut butter cups
because that's delicious.

-I think that's all

-And next up, I am obsessed

-Even if you washed

So we got new white Converse.

It has sparkles right

And these ones, which I love.

-I wore these, and
they're so cute.

-And next up, Bailey and I

title: What We Got for Christmas 2014 | Brooklyn and Bailey
